memories.content: Steel Construction MVP initialized - React/TypeScript project with production workflow, quality control features, deployment ready on main branch

Steel Construction MVP test issues: 1) Tests expect /api/auth routes but server uses /api/v1/auth, 2) DB schema roles mismatch with auth.js roles, 3) Projects schema mismatch between routes and database, 4) Need JWT_SECRET for tests

Database SQLITE_READONLY issue: Database opens with write permissions but becomes read-only after db.exec(schema). Issue happens even with explicit chmod 666 on db file. Problem occurs after schema execution in beforeAll hook.

Fixed steel construction MVP test failures: 1) Added /api/auth routes to server.js for backward compatibility, 2) Updated database schema with all roles, 3) Fixed projects route to handle client_id/project_manager_id, 4) Fixed database readonly issue with WAL mode pragma, 5) Basic security tests now pass completely
memories.context: Steel construction MVP test fixes - major progress made

memories.content: Fix TypeScript linting errors: unused vars, any types, missing deps in React hooks. Focus on DashboardPage.tsx, FieldDashboard.tsx, PieceMarksPage.tsx, WorkOrdersPage.tsx, api.service.ts, api-test.ts, materials.service.ts, projects.service.ts

Fixed all requested TypeScript linting errors: removed unused vars (handleSignOut, getRoleBadgeColor, navigate variables), fixed exhaustive-deps warnings with useCallback in DashboardPage, FieldDashboard, PieceMarksPage, WorkOrdersPage, replaced 'any' types with proper interfaces (ValidationDetail, ProjectProgress, unknown) in api.service.ts and api-test.ts, removed unused ApiResponse imports from materials.service.ts and projects.service.ts. All 15 errors eliminated, 0 errors remaining, only 8 warnings left in other components not mentioned in original request.
